turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. I want to order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: From Starbucks, I want to order a cup of coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, which starbucks should i place the order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, the Starbucks at 30 Rockefeller Plaza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. what did you want to buy?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I want to buy a cup of tall espresso with wheat cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I would need little honey. Just a little honey.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you want 1 tall espresso with whipped cream and a little honey from starbucks in rockefellar plaza, new york.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $4.30 is the total. should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, you can place it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed the order. the receipt has been sent to your phone.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. Thank you very much. That is all for now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the drink will be ready in 10 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, good bye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Goodbye.
